fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player at night to escort them to safety (Priority 6). This functions as a one-sided transport, with both you and your target being at the same number. (Example: If Player 1 was to chauffeur Player 5, both players would mechanically function as being Player 1.) If your target is visited, it will not affect either of you. If you are visited, the visit will affect both you and your target. (Example: if a Mafioso visits you, both you and your target will be attacked.) The target keeps their attributes and still visits their own target. (So yeah Mafioso can still kill themselves).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Transport immune.
- Roleblock immune.
- If a player rolls Chauffeur and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: You were chauffeured by the Chauffeur.
